Class ObstacleThree

  • java.lang.Object
    • jig.engine.Sprite
      • jig.engine.physics.Body
        • DynamicObject
          • ObstacleThree
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    jig.engine.Viewable

    public class ObstacleThree
extends DynamicObject
    Creates an obstacle that the frog must encounter on its way across the world. This specific implementation creates a crocodile object
    Version:
    May 21, 2016
    Author:
    Uday Tripathi, Period: 5, Assignment: Frogger Final Project, Sources: None
